mapper.sql: POS_ID, POS_CATE_ID, CNAME, POS_SUBCATE_ID, SNAME, POS_NAME, CORE_FLAG, DEGREE_CODE, EDUCATION_DEGREE, LEVEL_CODE, ORG_LEVEL, KSTR, MFLAG, ACTIVE_START_DATE, ACTIVE_END_DATE
mapper.select:
SELECT EPJV.POS_ID , EPJV.POS_NAME , EPJV.POS_CATE_ID , EPJV.CNAME , EPJV.POS_SUBCATE_ID , EPJV.SNAME , EPJV.LEVEL_CODE , EPJV.ORG_LEVEL , EPJV.CORE_FLAG , EPJV.DEGREE_CODE , EPJV.EDUCATION_DEGREE , EPJV.KSTR ,
case when ifnull(C.SNUM, 0)=0 then '否' else '是' end,
date_format(EPJV.ACTIVE_START_DATE,'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') as ACTIVE_START_DATE, date_format(EPJV.ACTIVE_END_DATE,'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s')as ACTIVE_END_DATE
FROM EHRCUC_POS_JPOS_V EPJV LEFT JOIN (SELECT EPS.PARENT_POS_ID, COUNT(1) SNUM FROM EHRCUC_POS_STANDARDPOS EPS WHERE 1 = 1 AND EPS.POS_TYPE = 'S'
and now() BETWEEN IFNULL(EPS.ACTIVE_START_DATE,date_sub( now( ) , INTERVAL 1 DAY )) AND IFNULL (EPS.ACTIVE_END_DATE,DATE_ADD( now( ), INTERVAL 1 DAY ))
and now() NOT BETWEEN IFNULL(EPS.ACTIVE_START_DATE,date_sub( now( ) , INTERVAL 1 DAY )) AND IFNULL(EPS.ACTIVE_END_DATE,DATE_ADD( now( ), INTERVAL 1 DAY ))
and 1 != 1
and EPS.org_id IN (SELECT RNG.ORGANIZATION_ID FROM HADES_RANGE_ORGANIZATION RNG WHERE RNG.RANGE_ID = #{rangeId})
GROUP BY EPS.PARENT_POS_ID) C on EPJV.POS_ID = C.PARENT_POS_ID where 1=1
and epjv.pos_cate_id = #{posCateId}
and epjv.pos_subcate_id = #{posSubcateId}
and epjv.pos_name like concat("%", trim(#{posName}), "%")
AND IFNULL(C.SNUM, 0) > 0
AND IFNULL(C.SNUM, 0) = 0
and (epjv.level_code like concat('%', #{orgLevelS}, '%') or epjv.level_code like concat('%', #{orgLevelD}, '%') or epjv.level_code like concat('%', #{orgLevelX}, '%'))
and epjv.degree_code = #{educationDegree}
and epjv.core_flag = #{coreFlag}
and now() BETWEEN IFNULL(EPJV.ACTIVE_START_DATE,date_sub( now( ) , INTERVAL 1 DAY )) AND IFNULL (EPJV.ACTIVE_END_DATE, DATE_ADD( now( ), INTERVAL 1 DAY ))
and now() NOT BETWEEN IFNULL(EPJV.ACTIVE_START_DATE,date_sub( now( ) , INTERVAL 1 DAY )) AND IFNULL(EPJV.ACTIVE_END_DATE,DATE_ADD( now( ), INTERVAL 1 DAY ))
and 1 != 1
order by EPJV.POS_ID

SELECT count(1)
FROM EHRCUC_POS_JPOS_V EPJV LEFT JOIN (SELECT EPS.PARENT_POS_ID, COUNT(1) SNUM FROM EHRCUC_POS_STANDARDPOS EPS WHERE 1 = 1 AND EPS.POS_TYPE = 'S'
and now() BETWEEN IFNULL(EPS.ACTIVE_START_DATE,date_sub( now( ) , INTERVAL 1 DAY )) AND IFNULL (EPS.ACTIVE_END_DATE, DATE_ADD( now( ), INTERVAL 1 DAY ))
and now() NOT BETWEEN IFNULL(EPS.ACTIVE_START_DATE,date_sub( now( ) , INTERVAL 1 DAY )) AND IFNULL(EPS.ACTIVE_END_DATE,DATE_ADD( now( ), INTERVAL 1 DAY ))
and 1 != 1
and EPS.org_id IN (SELECT RNG.ORGANIZATION_ID FROM HADES_RANGE_ORGANIZATION RNG WHERE RNG.RANGE_ID = #{rangeId})
GROUP BY EPS.PARENT_POS_ID) C ON EPJV.POS_ID = C.PARENT_POS_ID where 1=1
and epjv.pos_cate_id = #{posCateId}
and epjv.pos_subcate_id = #{posSubcateId}
and epjv.pos_name like concat("%", trim(#{posName}), "%")
AND IFNULL(C.SNUM, 0) > 0
AND IFNULL(C.SNUM, 0) = 0
and (epjv.level_code like concat('%', #{orgLevelS}, '%') or epjv.level_code like concat('%', #{orgLevelD}, '%') or epjv.level_code like concat('%', #{orgLevelX}, '%'))
and epjv.degree_code = #{educationDegree}
and epjv.core_flag = #{coreFlag}
and now() BETWEEN IFNULL(EPJV.ACTIVE_START_DATE,date_sub( now( ) , INTERVAL 1 DAY )) AND IFNULL (EPJV.ACTIVE_END_DATE, DATE_ADD( now( ), INTERVAL 1 DAY ))
and now() NOT BETWEEN IFNULL(EPJV.ACTIVE_START_DATE,date_sub( now( ) , INTERVAL 1 DAY )) AND IFNULL(EPJV.ACTIVE_END_DATE,DATE_ADD( now( ), INTERVAL 1 DAY ))
and 1 != 1

SELECT EPJV.POS_ID , EPJV.POS_NAME , EPJV.POS_CATE_ID , EPJV.CNAME , EPJV.POS_SUBCATE_ID , EPJV.SNAME , EPJV.LEVEL_CODE , EPJV.ORG_LEVEL , EPJV.CORE_FLAG , EPJV.DEGREE_CODE , EPJV.EDUCATION_DEGREE , EPJV.KSTR ,
case when ifnull(C.SNUM, 0)=0 then '否' else '是' end,
date_format(EPJV.ACTIVE_START_DATE,'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') as ACTIVE_START_DATE, date_format(EPJV.ACTIVE_END_DATE,'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s')as ACTIVE_END_DATE
FROM EHRCUC_POS_JPOS_V EPJV left join (SELECT EPS.PARENT_POS_ID, COUNT(1) SNUM FROM EHRCUC_POS_STANDARDPOS EPS WHERE 1 = 1 AND EPS.POS_TYPE = 'S'
and now() BETWEEN IFNULL(EPJV.ACTIVE_START_DATE,date_sub( now( ) , INTERVAL 1 DAY )) AND IFNULL (EPJV.ACTIVE_END_DATE, DATE_ADD( now( ), INTERVAL 1 DAY ))
and now() NOT BETWEEN IFNULL(EPJV.ACTIVE_START_DATE,date_sub( now( ) , INTERVAL 1 DAY )) AND IFNULL(EPJV.ACTIVE_END_DATE,DATE_ADD( now( ), INTERVAL 1 DAY ))
and 1 != 1
and EPS.org_id IN (SELECT RNG.ORGANIZATION_ID FROM HADES_RANGE_ORGANIZATION RNG WHERE RNG.RANGE_ID = #{rangeId})
GROUP BY EPS.PARENT_POS_ID) C on EPJV.POS_ID = C.PARENT_POS_ID where 1=1
and epjv.pos_cate_id = #{posCateId}
and epjv.pos_subcate_id = #{posSubcateId}
and epjv.pos_name like concat("%", trim(#{posName}), "%")
AND IFNULL(C.SNUM, 0) > 0
AND IFNULL(C.SNUM, 0) = 0
and (epjv.level_code like concat('%', #{orgLevelS}, '%') or epjv.level_code like concat('%', #{orgLevelD}, '%') or epjv.level_code like concat('%', #{orgLevelX}, '%'))
and epjv.degree_code = #{educationDegree}
and epjv.core_flag = #{coreFlag}
and now() BETWEEN IFNULL(EPJV.ACTIVE_START_DATE,date_sub( now( ) , INTERVAL 1 DAY )) AND IFNULL (EPJV.ACTIVE_END_DATE, DATE_ADD( now( ), INTERVAL 1 DAY ))
and now() NOT BETWEEN IFNULL(EPJV.ACTIVE_START_DATE,date_sub( now( ) , INTERVAL 1 DAY )) AND IFNULL(EPJV.ACTIVE_END_DATE,DATE_ADD( now( ), INTERVAL 1 DAY ))
and 1 != 1
order by EPJV.POS_ID
